channel.title: Runescape Look-A-Like Website Installation
channel.description:
[b]Overview:[/b] [b]Requirements:[/b]
[ul][li]Winrar Brain[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
Difficulty: 0.5/10 TOO EASY But there some people asking for this. Small tutorial about how to install my Runescape-Look-A-Like website based on css and html. The link of my site is here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,521341.40.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,521341.40.html[/url] I will do it fast an will try to explain it.
[b]Step #1:[/b] First Download all those files in the link and dont worry its 100% Clean and open source
Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?g626xhhrtdv1zcd]http://www.mediafire.com/?g626xhhrtdv1zcd[/url]
[b]Step #2:[/b] The source it self is html and css. It does't do any configuration in mysql or any cookies. Its just simply an source that is browsed and gives all images and all... Ok so first you got to get an webhost. I will do it with 000Webhost. They will verify the files after you upload them to make sure its good. But it is clean so dont worry. First go to this Link.
Link: [url=http://www.000webhost.com/]http://www.000webhost.com/[/url]
[b]Step #3:[/b] Create an Account on 000WebHost.com and its free. I guess you can figure all info all the way there.
Link: [url=http://www.000webhost.com/order.php]http://www.000webhost.com/order.php[/url]
[b]Step #4:[/b] After done Making an free account. Just login and go to the Cpanel. You will see down an Blue folder with paper Icon and the link "File Manager" Down on it,Click it And type your password that you took to registered in the Step #3. Click the button
[b]Step #5:[/b] When your inside your ftp panel. Just Click "public_html" and after Click the small button called "Upload". After that Zip all your downloaded files from step #1 to ZIP NOT RAR! and where you see "Archives (zip, tar, tgz, gz)" In 00webhost uploading you just click choose file button down and get your zip archive and click open after that just click the green check twice and you will have all your files uploaded to the webhost.

item.title: Runescape Look-A-Like Website Installation
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Overview:
Requirements:

[ul][li]Winrar
Brain[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Difficulty: 0.5/10 TOO EASY But there some people asking for this.
Small tutorial about how to install my Runescape-Look-A-Like website based on css and html. The link of my site is here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,521341.40.html I will do it fast an will try to explain it.

Step #1:
First Download all those files in the link and dont worry its 100% Clean and open source

Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?g626xhhrtdv1zcd

Step #2:
The source it self is html and css. It does’t do any configuration in mysql or any cookies. Its just simply an source that is browsed and gives all images and all… Ok so first you got to get an webhost. I will do it with 000Webhost. They will verify the files after you upload them to make sure its good. But it is clean so dont worry. First go to this Link.

Link: http://www.000webhost.com/

Step #3:
Create an Account on 000WebHost.com and its free. I guess you can figure all info all the way there.

Link: http://www.000webhost.com/order.php

Step #4:
After done Making an free account. Just login and go to the Cpanel. You will see down an Blue folder with paper Icon and the link “File Manager” Down on it,Click it And type your password that you took to registered in the Step #3. Click the button

Step #5:
When your inside your ftp panel. Just Click “public_html” and after Click the small button called “Upload”. After that Zip all your downloaded files from step #1 to ZIP NOT RAR!
and where you see “Archives (zip, tar, tgz, gz)” In 00webhost uploading you just click choose file button down and get your zip archive and click open after that just click the green check twice and you will have all your files uploaded to the webhost.
